movies.overview: When a raging flood traps a researcher and her young son, a call to a crucial mission puts their escape ‚Äî and the future of humanity ‚Äî on the line.
movies.tagline: The last day on earth. The one choice for survival.
movies.title: The Great Flood

movies.overview: A musical version of the classic story of the mean spirited Grinch who plots to steal Christmas from Whoville.
movies.title: Dr. Seuss' The Grinch Musical

movies.overview: When an American family is invited to spend the weekend at the idyllic country estate of a charming British family they befriended on vacation, what begins as a dream holiday soon warps into a snarled psychological nightmare.
movies.title: Speak No Evil

movies.original_title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery
movies.overview: When young priest Jud Duplenticy is sent to assist charismatic firebrand Monsignor Jefferson Wicks, it‚Äôs clear that all is not well in the pews. After a sudden and seemingly impossible murder rocks the town, the lack of an obvious suspect prompts local police chief Geraldine Scott to join forces with renowned detective Benoit Blanc to unravel a mystery that defies all logic.
movies.title: Wake Up Dead Man: A Knives Out Mystery

movies.overview: Holidaymakers arriving in a Club Med camp on the Ivory Coast are determined to forget their everyday problems and emotional disappointments. Games, competitions, outings, bathing and sunburn accompany a continual succession of casual affairs.
movies.title: French Fried Vacation

movies.overview: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
movies.tagline: A tough cop. A brilliant killer. An unspeakable crime.
movies.title: Insomnia

movies.overview: When K-pop superstars Rumi, Mira and Zoey aren't selling out stadiums, they're using their secret powers to protect their fans from supernatural threats.
movies.tagline: They sing. They dance. They battle demons.
movies.title: KPop Demon Hunters

movies.overview: An employee at the French Embassy in Bangkok invites his wife to join him ‚Äì and enjoy the benefits of their open marriage.
movies.tagline: Let's you feel good without feeling bad
movies.title: Emmanuelle

movies.overview: FRAGMENT | In the eyes of a jealous husband, a puppy is easily mistaken for an illegitimate child. Mr. Vibe wants nothing to do with the family‚Äôs new puppy and is thus unaware that Mrs. Vibe names the dog Ophelia. By a twist of fate, an orphaned child is left on the family‚Äôs doorstep. At the same time, Mr. Vibe discovers a letter with a plea to take care of little Ophelia. Jealousy consumes Mr. Vibe as he believes that this Ophelia must be his wife‚Äôs child born out of wedlock! (Stumfilm.dk)
movies.title: Sweet Little Thing

movies.overview: A young boy wins a tour through the most magnificent chocolate factory in the world, led by the world's most unusual candy maker.
movies.tagline: Prepare for a taste of adventure.
movies.title: Charlie and the Chocolate Factory

tv_shows.name: Stranger Things
tv_shows.overview: When a young boy vanishes, a small town uncovers a mystery involving secret experiments, terrifying supernatural forces, and one strange little girl.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Strange things are afoot in Hawkins, Indiana, where a young boy's sudden disappearance unearths a young girl with otherworldly powers.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 2
seasons.overview: It's been nearly a year since Will's strange disappearance. But life's hardly back to normal in Hawkins. Not even close.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 3
seasons.overview: Budding romance. A brand-new mall. And rabid rats running toward danger. It's the summer of 1985 in Hawkins ... and one summer can change everything.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 4
seasons.overview: Darkness returns to Hawkins just in time for spring break, igniting fresh terror, disturbing memories ‚Äî and an ominous new threat.

seasons.name: Stranger Things 5
seasons.overview: The fall of 1987. Hawkins is scarred by rifts. Vecna has vanished and the government has placed the town under military quarantine, forcing Eleven back into hiding. To end this nightmare, they'll need everyone together, one last time.

last_episode_to_air.name: Veni, Vidi, Venezia
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the sink-or-swim chaos of Venice Fashion Week, Emily scrambles to hit a high-water mark. Back in Paris, the agency faces a tidal wave of its own.

tv_shows.name: Emily in Paris
tv_shows.overview: New passions. New fashions. New Emily? A plucky American marketing whiz spreads her wings in life and love after landing her dream job in Paris.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After landing her dream job in Paris, Chicago marketing exec Emily Cooper embraces her adventurous new life while juggling work, friends and romance.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: More fun. More fashion. More faux pas. As Emily finds her footing in Paris, the fallout from a night of passion could send her stumbling into trouble.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: A year after moving to Paris for her dream job, Emily arrives at a career and romantic crossroads that will force her to decide where her future lies.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: Emily‚Äôs life in Paris may have beaucoup drama, but she‚Äôs ready to make bold choices to get everything she wants from the city ‚Äî and man ‚Äî of her dreams.

seasons.name: Season 5
seasons.overview: Now the head of Agence Grateau Rome, Emily faces professional and romantic challenges as she adapts to life in a new city.

tv_shows.tagline: The best journeys take unexpected turns.
